title: Pentagon’s Strategy Says China and Russia Pose Very Different Challenges
description: A new document describes the military’s response to a new era in broad terms and guides Pentagon policy and budget decisions, but it lacks details.
dc:creator: Eric Schmitt, David E. Sanger and William J. Broad
category: United States Defense and Military Forces
Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
media:credit: Kenny Holston for The New York Times
media:description: U.S. troops in Fort Bragg, N.C., prepared to deploy to Eastern Europe in early February in response to the crisis in Ukraine.
